From SMM to Brand Defender: How AI Agents Transform Advertising

May 14, 2025

AI agents: SMM manager Ella, SEO specialist Jane, brand reputation guardian, and virtual salesperson who independently offers discounts. Process automation solutions are being created by both global tech giants like Microsoft and ambitious startups like Israeli MarkeTeam.

We shared on AdPass about cases of digital assistant implementation in advertising, marketing, and sales. Full text at this link.
